### `r level_label(x, params$all_levels)`

```{r, echo = FALSE}
params$input_data |>
  filter(level == x) |>
  select(criteria, status = status_label) |>
  gt() |>
  cols_label(criteria = "Criteria", status = "Status") |>
  cols_width(criteria ~ pct(80), status ~ pct(20)) |>
  tab_options(table.align = "left",
              table.width = pct(100)) |>
  tab_style(
    style = list(cell_text(weight = "bold")),
    locations = list(cells_column_labels())
  )
```
